name: Nick Collett
position: Co-founder of Yuki-Co, LLC.  An international placing agent.

posts.title: Japan set for 44.8% Earnings Growth in 2021

current_company.name: Yuki-Co, LLC
current_company.title: Co-founder of Yuki-Co, LLC.  An international placing agent.

experience.title: Partner
experience.description: Yuki - Co, LLC is a US Broker/Dealer firm based out of Utah, and acts as the international placing agent for Yuki Management & Research Co, LTD (YMR). We raise capital for YMR and take care of client relations as well as assist them with launching new funds. Currently the main funds we are focused on for them are the Yuki Japan Rebounding Growth fund and the Yuki Global Select Fund.
